entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 24 February 2023
